text: A Future Without a Past... is the debut studio album by Leaders of the New School. The album was released on July 2, 1991. ==Track listing== ==Charts== Chart (1991) Peak position U.S. Billboard 200 128 U.S. Heatseekers 1 U.S. R&B; Albums 53 ==References== Category:1991 albums
title: A Future Without a Past...
